entity.name: listings
entity.query: select R.FID as "id", R.FURL as "url", R.FKROOMLISTINGID as "roomlistingId", R.FIMAGETYPE as "imageType", R.FFIRSTCOVER as "firstCover", R.FIDX as "idx", R.FCREATETIME as "createTime", R.FKCREATORID as "creator", R.FATTRIBUTE as "attribute" from T_website_EBROOMLISTINGIMAGE R
